Broadlist Years Lists

2023 National Book Award

In the National Book Award list selected 10 books.

Broadlist has categorized these selections as:

  • Verylonglist (10 books)
  • Longlist (10 books)
  • Shortlist (5 books)
  • Winners (1 books)

Read more about how Broadlist categorizes lists.
